name: MSSMACC.proj_val
declaration:
theorem MSSMACC.proj_val (T : ACCSystemLinear.LinSols MSSMACC.toACCSystemLinear) : (MSSMACC.proj T).val =
  ((MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.B₃.val) T.val - (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) T.val) • MSSMACC.Y₃.val +
      ((MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) T.val - 2 * (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.B₃.val) T.val) • MSSMACC.B₃.val +
    (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) MSSMACC.B₃.val • T.val

name: MSSMACC.AnomalyFreePerp.mk
declaration: ctor MSSMACC.AnomalyFreePerp.mk (toLinSols : ACCSystemLinear.LinSols MSSMACC.toACCSystemLinear) (perpY₃ : (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) toLinSols.val = 0) (perpB₃ : (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.B₃.val) toLinSols.val = 0) : MSSMACC.AnomalyFreePerp

name: MSSMACC.cube_proj_proj_B₃
declaration:
theorem MSSMACC.cube_proj_proj_B₃ (T : ACCSystemLinear.LinSols MSSMACC.toACCSystemLinear) : ((MSSMACCs.cubeTriLin (MSSMACC.proj T).val) (MSSMACC.proj T).val) MSSMACC.B₃.val =
  (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) MSSMACC.B₃.val ^ 2 * ((MSSMACCs.cubeTriLin T.val) T.val) MSSMACC.B₃.val

name: MSSMACC.cube_proj_proj_Y₃
declaration:
theorem MSSMACC.cube_proj_proj_Y₃ (T : ACCSystemLinear.LinSols MSSMACC.toACCSystemLinear) : ((MSSMACCs.cubeTriLin (MSSMACC.proj T).val) (MSSMACC.proj T).val) MSSMACC.Y₃.val =
  (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) MSSMACC.B₃.val ^ 2 * ((MSSMACCs.cubeTriLin T.val) T.val) MSSMACC.Y₃.val

name: MSSMACC.quad_self_proj
declaration:
theorem MSSMACC.quad_self_proj (T : ACCSystem.Sols MSSMACC) : (MSSMACCs.quadBiLin T.val) (MSSMACC.proj T.toLinSols).val =
  ((MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.B₃.val) T.val - (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) T.val) *
      (MSSMACCs.quadBiLin MSSMACC.Y₃.val) T.val +
    ((MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) T.val - 2 * (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.B₃.val) T.val) *
      (MSSMACCs.quadBiLin MSSMACC.B₃.val) T.val

name: MSSMACC.proj
declaration:
/-- The projection of an object in `MSSMACC.AnomalyFreeLinear` onto the subspace
orthgonal to `Y₃` and`B₃`. -/
def MSSMACC.proj (T : ACCSystemLinear.LinSols MSSMACC.toACCSystemLinear) : MSSMACC.AnomalyFreePerp

name: MSSMACC.Y₃_plus_B₃_plus_proj
declaration:
theorem MSSMACC.Y₃_plus_B₃_plus_proj (T : ACCSystemLinear.LinSols MSSMACC.toACCSystemLinear) (a : ℚ) (b : ℚ) (c : ℚ) : a • MSSMACC.Y₃.val + b • MSSMACC.B₃.val + c • (MSSMACC.proj T).val =
  (a + c * ((MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.B₃.val) T.val - (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) T.val)) • MSSMACC.Y₃.val +
      (b + c * ((MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) T.val - 2 * (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.B₃.val) T.val)) • MSSMACC.B₃.val +
    ((MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) MSSMACC.B₃.val * c) • T.val

name: MSSMACC.AnomalyFreePerp
declaration:
/-- The type of linear solutions orthogonal to $Y_3$ and $B_3$. -/
structure MSSMACC.AnomalyFreePerp  : Type

name: MSSMACC.quad_B₃_proj
declaration:
theorem MSSMACC.quad_B₃_proj (T : ACCSystemLinear.LinSols MSSMACC.toACCSystemLinear) : (MSSMACCs.quadBiLin MSSMACC.B₃.val) (MSSMACC.proj T).val =
  (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) MSSMACC.B₃.val * (MSSMACCs.quadBiLin MSSMACC.B₃.val) T.val

name: MSSMACC.cube_proj_proj_self
declaration:
theorem MSSMACC.cube_proj_proj_self (T : ACCSystem.Sols MSSMACC) : ((MSSMACCs.cubeTriLin (MSSMACC.proj T.toLinSols).val) (MSSMACC.proj T.toLinSols).val) T.val =
  2 * (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) MSSMACC.B₃.val *
    (((MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.B₃.val) T.val - (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) T.val) *
        ((MSSMACCs.cubeTriLin T.val) T.val) MSSMACC.Y₃.val +
      ((MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) T.val - 2 * (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.B₃.val) T.val) *
        ((MSSMACCs.cubeTriLin T.val) T.val) MSSMACC.B₃.val)

name: MSSMACC.cube_proj
declaration:
theorem MSSMACC.cube_proj (T : ACCSystem.Sols MSSMACC) : ((MSSMACCs.cubeTriLin (MSSMACC.proj T.toLinSols).val) (MSSMACC.proj T.toLinSols).val) (MSSMACC.proj T.toLinSols).val =
  3 * (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) MSSMACC.B₃.val ^ 2 *
    (((MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.B₃.val) T.val - (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) T.val) *
        ((MSSMACCs.cubeTriLin T.val) T.val) MSSMACC.Y₃.val +
      ((MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) T.val - 2 * (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.B₃.val) T.val) *
        ((MSSMACCs.cubeTriLin T.val) T.val) MSSMACC.B₃.val)

name: MSSMACC.quad_Y₃_proj
declaration:
theorem MSSMACC.quad_Y₃_proj (T : ACCSystemLinear.LinSols MSSMACC.toACCSystemLinear) : (MSSMACCs.quadBiLin MSSMACC.Y₃.val) (MSSMACC.proj T).val =
  (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) MSSMACC.B₃.val * (MSSMACCs.quadBiLin MSSMACC.Y₃.val) T.val

name: MSSMACC.quad_proj
declaration:
theorem MSSMACC.quad_proj (T : ACCSystem.Sols MSSMACC) : (MSSMACCs.quadBiLin (MSSMACC.proj T.toLinSols).val) (MSSMACC.proj T.toLinSols).val =
  2 * (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) MSSMACC.B₃.val *
    (((MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.B₃.val) T.val - (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) T.val) *
        (MSSMACCs.quadBiLin MSSMACC.Y₃.val) T.val +
      ((MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.Y₃.val) T.val - 2 * (MSSMACC.dot MSSMACC.B₃.val) T.val) *
        (MSSMACCs.quadBiLin MSSMACC.B₃.val) T.val)
